import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

class R101
{
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
		String s = in.nextLine();
		char c = in.next().charAt(0);
		int counter = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++)  {
			if(c == s.charAt(i))
				counter++;
		}
		System.out.println(counter);
	}
}
